description: Crashes whenever you try to do two things at once. i.e. listening to a podcast and adding another podcast.
summary: A bit unstable, but best looking

description: App is pretty unstable, and crashes a lot for me, but does show great promise.
From the brief moment it was working the interface was clean and quite well designed. Howeve upon playing and pausing one episode - it crashed... and never recovered.
Promising, looks great but keeps crashing.
Can't do anything with it. Literally. I tried to add a feed but it crashed.

I really want to like this piece of software as it is the best looking podcast client by a long shot but since updating Fedora to 29 I can not keep it open longer than 30 seconds before it freezes and crashes

It installed on OpenSUSE Leap 15 and found the podcast through the search box and listed episodes. I downloaded the first episode and apparently it downloaded but it doesn't play pressing the play button or by clicking the Play This Episode button. Upon relaunch of the application it tells me to download the peisode again.

+ Nice UI
+ I could find all my beloved podcasts and subscribe to them
+ No stability issues so far on Fedora 30

- Sorting episodes by age is buggy
Awesome application, great podcasts collection, and a gorgeous ui.
summary: Awesome application, great podcasts collection, and a gorgeous ui

description: It works for fist few times but then you cant launch it. Has good features and great UI but what good is that if you cant get running?

This product looks fantastic and does everything I want in a podcast player - easy to find and subscribe to podcasts, and it plays podcasts within the app. However, it's so unstable it's barely usable. I don't know if I can stick with it..

This application is one of the best looking podcast app I've ever seen in Linux, I've been using Linux for almost 15 years. However this application has a tendency to crash or podcast episodes not playing or stops playing all of the sudden. I really hope the developers improve this application.
Please at least make it work on vanilla gnome. I used to be a huge fan of elementary softwares, but this is lowering my confidence.
Ein super Programm, welches alles bietet, was ich zum Hören von Podcasts benötige!
Das Programm sieht richtig toll aus und funktioniert toll. Ich habe sofort meine Podcasts wiedergefunden.
Application très belle, mais totalement inutilisable (plantage, ralentissement monstre, n'actualise pas les podcasts).
